entry.tran: (思想观念)忠于右派的，坚决支持保守党的
entry.def: If you describe someone as true-blue, you mean that they are right-wing in their ideas and opinions.

example.ex: Her husband is a true blue Tory.
example.tran: 她丈夫是坚定的保守党党员。

entry.tran: 忠贞不渝的;坚定不移的
entry.def: A true-blue supporter of something is someone who is very loyal and reliable.
